insert into product_tb(prdCode, prdName, prdPrice, prdOname, prdRname, prdMadeIn, prdMt, prdCnt, prdQc, prdCare, prdMadeDate) values(#{prdCode}, #{prdName}, #{prdPrice}, #{prdOname}, #{prdRname}, #{prdMadeIn}, #{prdMt}, #{prdCnt}, #{prdQc}, #{prdCare}, #{prdMadeDate})
select MAX(prdIndex) from product_tb
mapper.select: select * from product_tb where prdDel != 'Y' and prdIndex = #{prdIndex}
select prdIndex, prdCode, prdName, prdPrice, prdRname from product_tb where prdDel != 'Y' order by prdDate desc limit 0, #{maxPrd}

SELECT p.prdIndex, p.prdCode, p.prdName, p.prdPrice, p.prdRname, COALESCE(SUM(o.orderItemStock), 0) as prdSales FROM product_tb p left join Size_Tb s on p.prdIndex = s.prdIndex left join Order_Item_Tb o ON s.sizeIndex = o.sizeIndex where p.prdDel != 'Y' GROUP BY p.prdIndex, p.prdName ORDER BY prdSales DESC limit 0, #{maxPrd};
select count(*) from product_tb where prdCode = #{prdCode} and prdDel != 'Y'

select count(*) from product_tb where 1 = 1 and prdDel != 'Y'
and prdCode like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
and prdName like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')

select * from product_tb where 1 = 1 and prdDel != 'Y'
and prdCode like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
and prdName like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
limit #{start}, #{perPage}
mapper.update: update product_tb set prdDel = 'Y' where prdIndex = #{prdIndex}
